title: PolymatAI: Free Polymer Property Prediction for Everyone
excerpt: Introduction to our free web tool that lets anyone predict reactivity ratios, Kp, Tg, and water solubility from molecular structure... and how to use it.

title: Reinforcement Learning: My Journey to Control Chemical Reactors
excerpt: How I went from knowing little about reinforcement learning to using it for real-time control of polymerization reactors. These are the actual notebooks I wrote while teaching myself RL, now cleaned up so you can learn the same way I did.
